open.invalidInput: Please enter an opening time in the 12 hour format (ie. 08:00 AM). You may also enter "24 hours".
open.greaterThanNext: Please enter an opening time that is before the closing time.
open.lessThanPrevious: Please enter an opening time that is after the previous closing time.
open.midnightNotLast: Midnight can only be selected for the day's last closing time.

close.invalidInput: Please enter a closing time in the 12 hour format (ie. 05:00 PM). You may also enter "24 hours" or "Midnight".
close.greaterThanNext: Please enter a closing time that is after the opening time.
close.lessThanPrevious: Please enter a closing time that is before the next opening time.
close.midnightNotLast: Midnight can only be selected for the day's last closing time.
